scripts.copy-files: cp package.json dist/ && cp database/knexfile.js dist/database/knexfile.js && cp -r public dist/ && cp -r node_modules dist/ && cp -r database/migrations dist/database/ && cp -r database/seeds dist/database/
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run tsc && yarn run babel && yarn run copy-files
scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development yarn run build && yarn run copy-dotenv && cd dist && NODE_ENV=development yarn start
scripts.test: yarn run build && yarn run copy-dotenv && cd dist && NODE_ENV=test yarn run reset-database-test && cd database && NODE_ENV=test ../node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha ../**/*.mocha.js
scripts.reset-database-test: NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:rollback --knexfile database/knexfile.js && NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:latest --knexfile database/knexfile.js && NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run --knexfile database/knexfile.js
scripts.reset-database-dev: NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:rollback --knexfile database/knexfile.js && NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:latest --knexfile database/knexfile.js && NODE_ENV=development knex seed:run --knexfile database/knexfile.js
